game.name: Heir to the Queen
game.shortDescription: 평범한 여고생이었던 야무, 어느 날 갑자기 고대 이집트의 여왕이 될 운명을 맞이하는데…
game.shortDescriptionEn: An ordinary high school girl, Yamu, suddenly finds herself destined to become the Queen of ancient Egypt…

reviewHighlights.text: Heir to the Queen, developed and published by 티민이, is a small-scale indie adventure that thrives on atmosphere, curiosity, and a quietly strange premi...
If you have a few minutes to spare, it's a short kinetic novel that doesn't cost much and it's not a bad story.
